Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Production date: 143 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 143.)
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, unclear number. Name Anaxandros.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (11)
